sentences.sentence: Charlotte needed to think of something special – Special enough to change the way people saw the world, or at least one pig in the world, anyway.
sentences.translation: 夏洛特需要想些特别的事，特别到能改变世人对这个世界的看法，或者，至少改变这世界上的某头猪。

sentences.sentence: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
sentences.translation: 拥有的多并不算富有，给予的多才算富有。

sentences.sentence: There are some natures too noble to curb and too lofty to bend.
sentences.translation: 有些性情，崇高不可遏，高傲不可屈。

sentences.sentence: The most valuable commodity I know is time.
It is wise to turn circumstances to good account.
sentences.translation: 为好的结果而转换立场是明智的决定。
